### SQL

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(DBI)
library(dplyr)
library(dbplyr)
con <- DBI::dbConnect(
  RMariaDB::MariaDB(), 
  host = "relational.fit.cvut.cz", 
  port = 3306, 
  username = "guest", 
  password = "relational",
  dbname = "financial"
)
DBI::dbListTables(con)
```

```{sql, connection=con}
SELECT account_id, date, frequency 
FROM account 
limit 100
```

```{r}
tbl(con, "account")
```
